current.checkout_note:
Please note we are unable to make changes to an order once they’re placed so please double check that you have everything you want & your address is correct.

If you’re outside of the US, shipping times for both express and standard shipping will vary based on proximity to metro areas.
current.fit_note:
We aim for consistency in every collection so you always feel perfect when you put on MONDAY, but each of our unique fabrics can offer a slightly different fit. Some fabrics (crinkle and ribbed) offer a looser fit, so if you're between sizes, we recommend sizing down. Our chevron fabric tends to offer a tighter fit, so if between sizes, we recommend sizing up.

Beachwear: This fabric will differ from our swimwear, therefore an exact color match cannot be guaranteed.

settings.text: FREE SHIPPING ON US ORDERS OVER $200 📦
BUY NOW, SAVE LATER W/ KLARNA 🛒

settings.title: The Fit Dictionary
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That’s why we obsess about fit and don’t overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.title: Forever About Fit
settings.text: Monday Swimwear understands that all bodies are unique and our mission is to create suits that celebrate all different body types and let individuality shine. That’s why we obsess about fit and don’t overlook a single detail. Click to see our fit guide and recommendations so you can find your perfect fit!

settings.disclaimer:
Fit is the most important part of our process and because sizing and fit involve a variety of factors (such as, personal preference and body shapes), we want to be transparent that recommended sizing cannot guarantee the exact fit you’re looking for. If you have any questions, please contact our amazing customer service and fit specialist team who can assist you in finding the right size and style for you!

We provide a range of bra sizes for each Monday top size. If you are between sizes - for our underwire tops we recommend sizing down, for all other tops you can size up or down based on preferred coverage. For example, Natasha is a 34D and wears an S in some tops and an M in others. If your size is not accounted for in our chart, or it you are uncertain what size to order, please reach out to customerservice@mondayswimwear.com and we will be happy to help you to select a size!

settings.title: The V Range
settings.text:
We reimagined XL - XXXL sizes to “V” for Voluptuous, “VV” for Very Voluptuous, and
"VVV" Very Very Voluptuous to better represent the women wearing them.

Monday Co-Creator, Devin Brugman has always struggled to find swimwear that was supportive enough for her E/F cup bust. Her mission with the “V’ Range is to provide women with supportive, chic, and comfortable suits for larger cup sizes. Naturally, the next step was to expand this range to currently include bottoms, one pieces, and beachwear for those size 12-18 US.

settings.title: Take our quiz and we’ll help find your perfect fit.
The Aruba One Piece
settings.description: The Aruba One Piece is inarguably our most flattering and versatile swimsuit. Designed with a supportive under-bust band, a deep V-neckline and supportive wide straps — that offers comfort for every figure.
settings.highlights: Deep V neckline, adjustable bust coverage, wide shoulder straps, supportive waist panel
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G

settings.title: The Bahamas One Piece
settings.description: The Bahamas One Piece offers a comfortable and timeless look. Designed with a built-in-bra shelf for extra support and a mid- high cut leg, this one piece is universally flattering on all body shapes.
settings.highlights: Rounded neckline, built-in bra with removable padding, high leg, low back
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Clovelly One Piece
settings.description: The Clovelly One Piece is guarenteed make you look and feel your best. With its underwire support, open back detail, adjustability and high leg cut, this figure flattering one piece is nothing short of perfection. We love this piece under the Belize Pant or La Jolla Short.
settings.highlights: Underwire cups, open back detail w/ back tie closure, adjustable shoulder straps, high leg, cheeky coverage
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Corsica One Piece
settings.description: Inspired by the chic French island of Corsica, the Corsica One Piece was designed with a flattering scoop neckline and chic square back complete with a supportive pleated waist detail. Made for every size in mind, flattering an A to an F cup.
settings.highlights: Scoop neckline, pleated waist detail, square back neckline
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-F

settings.title: The Maui One Piece
settings.description: The Maui One Piece was designed with comfort and support in mind. With a classic silhouette, this one piece is made to flatter your figure with the high cut leg, supportive underwire cups and adjustable shoulder straps for a custom fit.
settings.highlights: Underwire cups, adjustable shoulder straps, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-DDD

settings.title: The Portofino One Piece
settings.description: The Portofino One Piece is complemented by a structured support panel under the bust featuring adjustable straps for extra support and a high leg — made to accentuate every figure.
settings.highlights: Deep V neckline, supportive waist panel, adjustable shoulder straps
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes B-DDD

settings.title: The Santa Caterina One Piece
settings.description: Meet our newest one piece, the Santa Caterina. Made to cover you in just the right places while baring some skin, this playful one piece is complete with  v-neckline, scoop back and high cut leg for the perfect summer touch. We love this one piece paired under the Mykonos Sarong or La Jolla Short!
settings.highlights: V-neck line, scoop back, high cut leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Sardinia One Piece
settings.description: The Sardinia One Piece is a well-fitted and timeless one piece made to take you from day to night. Featuring a chic silhouette, this classic one piece is complete with a flattering square neckline, open back, high leg and moderate coverage.
settings.highlights: Square neckline, open back, wide supportive straps, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D

settings.title: The Sausalito One Piece
settings.description: You can't plan a getaway without cute swimwear! Doubling as a bodysuit, our Sausalito One Piece is the perfect versatile option featuring a scoop neckline with added under-bust support, adjustable straps, a high leg cheeky cut that effortlessly slips under any dress or our La Jolla Shorts.
settings.highlights: Scoop neckline, under-bust support, adjustable shoulder straps, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G

settings.title: The Sicily One Piece
settings.description: Chic and new, the Sicily One Piece has become one of our best-sellers. With an adjustable one-shoulder design, a rounded neckline and moderate coverage, this figure flattering one piece transitions from sand to seaside lunch in a snap.
settings.highlights: Rounded neckline, adjustable 1-shoulder strap, high leg
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The St. Barth's One Piece
settings.description: We can't take our eyes off the St. Barth's One Piece. From the sultry cut-out detail to the flattering silhouette, this must-have one piece is made to show off your figure. Complete with a rounded v-neckline, adjustable back tie closure and a gold ring detail. All eyes on you!
settings.highlights: Rounded v-neckline, adjustable back tie, high cut leg, chunky gold ring detail
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-DD

settings.title: The Whitehaven One Piece
settings.description: The Whitehaven One Piece is an all-around must have! Its chic neckline, low back and adjustable waist ties instantly elevates your look. We love this one piece as a bodysuit under the Tahiti, Hampton or Monaco Pant for a beach to dinner set.
settings.highlights: Straight neckline, low open back, high leg, adjustable shoulder straps, adjustable waist ties
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Vera One Piece
settings.description: Suit up in style in our newest one shoulder: The Vera One Piece. Sophisticated and chic, this one piece features a sleek one-shoulder design with our favorite cheeky coverage, gold ring detailing and adjustable back tie. Made to easily transition under any sarong for cocktail hour.
settings.highlights:
Straight neckline, one shoulder, adjustable back tie, high cut leg, chunky gold ring detail 
cheeky coverage
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Antigua Bottom
settings.description: Complementing every shape, the Antigua Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. Complete with a high-cut leg and supportive waistband with a chunky gold ring. The higher leg shape elongates your figure and gives a cheekier back coverage.
settings.highlights: High cut leg, high waisted fit, chunky gold ring detail
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Argentina Bottom
settings.description: Whether you opt for the beach or pool, the Argentina Bottom is the perfect way to accentuate your waist. This high waisted bottom features a high cut leg and cheeky coverage that will complement every figure.
settings.highlights: High cut leg, high waisted fit
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-L

settings.title: The Barbados Bottom
settings.description: Minimal tanlines await in the the Barbados Bottom. This flattering bikini bottom features thin straps and a subtle high cut leg with minimal coverage.
settings.highlights: Thin side straps
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-L
settings.fit_tip: Runs small. We recommend to size up for a comfortable and flattering fit.

settings.title: The Byron Bottom
settings.description: Believe us when we tell you that the Byron Bottom will be the staple bottom in your swimwear collection. With a mid-rise fit and cheeky coverage, this swim bottom is extremely flattering and reassuringly comfortable
settings.highlights: Mid-rise bottom
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-VVV

settings.title: The Byron Thong
settings.description: For the girl that opts for minimal tan lines, the Byron Thong was made for you. Giving your cheeks minimal coverage, this bottom is finished with an easy pull on fit for the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: Clean finish, mid-rise, thong coverage
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-L

settings.title: The Cala Conta Bottom
settings.description: Refresh your swimsuits with a flirty bottom. Featuring side cutouts, adjustable ties and a cheeky coverage, the Cala Conta Bottom shows off your silhouette while giving you the perfect fit every time.
settings.highlights: High leg, mid-rise, loop through side hip detail with adjustable tie side
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-VV

settings.title: The Capri Bottom
settings.description:
Elegant at every angle

The Capri Bottom is one of our best sellers and is said to be one of our most flattering silhouettes. Designed with adjustable side sliders and a high leg fit, this bottom is guaranteed to make you look your best from every angle with its cheeky coverage.
settings.highlights: Can be worn high leg, gold hardware details
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Capri Thong
settings.description: Less coverage, a high-cut leg and effortless, need we say more? The Capri Thong is our newest high waisted bottom guaranteed to be your summer go-to to achieve the perfect tan.
settings.highlights: High-cut leg, high waisted, thong coverage
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-VV

settings.title: The Clovelly Bottom
settings.description: The Clovelly Bottom is one of our best selling bottoms. Designed with wide side panels and the perfect amount of stretch, this bottom is complete with cinched fabric made to flatter all body shapes.

settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Hanalei Bottom
settings.description: Satisfy your sun-soaking needs in the Hanalei Bottom. A play off of our famous Palma Bottom, this classic string bottom features dainty gold rings and adjustable ultra-thin straps for a barely-there feel.
settings.highlights: Adjustable side ties with gold hardware detail, dainty gold rings, mid rise
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Isla Mujeres Bottom
settings.description: Find the perfect fit in the Isla Mujeres Bottom. Thoughtfully designed to give as little or as much coverage as you want, this body-baring bikini features an adjustable front ruching and side tie details.

settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Kauai Bottom
settings.description: This simple yet cheeky bikini is all you'll want this summer! The Kauai Bottom is your classic bikini bottom that features thin straps, a flattering shape and cheeky coverage for the perfect tan.

settings.title: The Malta Bottom
settings.description: Show off your figure in the Malta Bottom. Flaunting an adjustable high leg silhouette, this bikini bottom will keep eyes on you with the strappy details and minimal back coverage.

settings.title: The Maui Bottom
settings.description: The Maui Bottom is an instant favorite to our best selling bottoms. Offering a figure flattering touch with the adjustable side ties and cheeky coverage, this bottom is made to give you a relaxed and confident look no matter your shape!
settings.highlights: Thick adjustable side ties, mid-rise
settings.fit: Available in sizes P-V

settings.title: The Morocco Bottom
settings.description: The Morocco Bottom is perfect for the girl who wants minimal coverage with a little extra! Featuring a high cut leg and high waisted fit, this bottom features gold ring details with a soft strap side for the perfect tan.

settings.fit: Available in sizes P-VV

settings.title: The Palma Bottom
settings.description: The Palma Bottom is shaped to flatter and accentuate your backside! This tie-sided triangle bikini bottom features small detailed gold hardware hanging from each tie and a custom fit each wear.

settings.description: If you love the Palma Bottom, you'll need the Palomino Bottom. Featuring a high waist and high leg this, tie side bottom is perfect for that 90's iconic look.

settings.description: The Riviera bottom is a true high-waist bottom with a flattering high-cut leg. This cut enhances curves and flatters the midsection and backside.

settings.fit: Available in sizes P-VVV
settings.coverage: High Waisted / Moderate / Cheeky / High Leg

Bandeau with removable padding, removable and adjustable halter strap, side boning 
pull on style

Complete with a "U" wire detail, underwire support and an adjustable back tie closure, this flirty top is perfect for your spring getaway.

settings.description: The Portugal Top is one of the Monday team's favorite style. Made from recycled fibers, this figure flattering silhouette offers a supportive under-bust band, an accentuating V neckline, wide straps and an adjustable front tie back closure for a custom fit.
settings.highlights: V neckline, wide straps, supportive under-bust band, adjustable front tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G.

settings.title: The Puerto Rico Top
settings.description: The Puerto Rico Top was made to be your favorite. Designed with a modern square neckline, supportive wide straps and an adjustable back tie closure for the perfect sun-soaking look—and doubles as a crop top.
settings.highlights: Square neckline, wide straps, adjustable back tie closure, princess seams
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E.

settings.title: The Sicily Top
settings.description: For sunning, lounging and dining, the Sicily Top effortlessly transitions you through your itinerary. Designed in a buttery soft fabric, this figure flattering bikini top compliments your body with its sleek asymmetrical design and gives you the perfect fit with the adjustable shoulder strap and back tie closure.
settings.highlights: Adjustable one shoulder strap, back tie closure, side boning
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-E

settings.title: The Sorrento Top
settings.description: Introducing our newest underwire, the Sorrento Top. Designed with support and shape in mind, this flattering swim top holds and lifts everything into one place. Complete with a demi shaped underwire cup, adjustable shoulder straps and a back tie closure for a custom fit.
settings.highlights: Demi shaped underwire cups, soft adjustable shoulder straps, adjustable back tie closure
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-G

settings.title: The St. Martin Top
settings.description: Alluring and eye-catching, our St. Martin Top is made to be shown off. Flattering  from every angle, this bikini top features adjustable shoulder straps with long adjustable front ties that can be wrapped and worn multiple ways.
settings.highlights: Adjustable shoulder straps, adjustable wrap ties
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D
settings.fit_tip: Runs small. We recommend to size up if between sizes for a comfortable and flattering fit.

settings.title: The St. Martinique Bandeau
settings.description: The St. Martinique Bandeau is the swimsuit you’ll want in your suitcase. From the "U" wire detail, to the optional strap support, this top is thoughtfully made to redefine the bandeau bikini for the perfect tan.
settings.highlights:
U-wire detail, bandeau with removable padding, removable and adjustable halter strap, adjustable back tie closure
side boning
settings.fit: Designed to best fit cup sizes A-D. Runs small. We recommend to size up for a comfortable fit.

settings.title: The Tamarama Top
settings.description: A much needed vacation is on the horizon. Elevate your classic bikini tops in the Tamarama Top. Designed for minimal tan lines in mind with thin adjustable ties and bandeau shaped cups, this top will have you looking & feeling your best.

settings.title: What is your Black Friday / Cyber Monday return policy?
settings.answer: All orders placed with any of our Black Friday / Cyber Monday discount codes are only eligible for a return for store credit, no exchanges or refunds. If you purchase an item that is marked as final sale, the item is not eligible for any form of a return. We do not offer price adjustments for any previous orders.

settings.title: I am located in the US, what is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We happily accept returns in original condition (unused, unworn, and unaltered) with tags and liners attached for either a refund, store credit, or a one time exchange. All return requests must be made within 30 days after the date of delivery. The refund, store credit, or exchange will be processed within 14 business days from the date of the returned package. We can only process a refund back to the original payment method and we charge a returns processing fee of $6.95 per return order and we do not refund any shipping fees.

All Emma Pills products are final sale.

Products listed on sale at 20% & 40% off can only be returned for store credits or exchanges, no refunds. Any products listed at final sale, cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.title: I am an international customer, what is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We happily accept returns in original condition (unused, unworn, and unaltered) with tags and liners attached for either a refund or store credit. All return requests must be made within 30 days after the date of delivery. The refund will be processed within 14 business days from the date of the returned package. We can only process a refund back to the original payment method and we do not refund any shipping fees. We do not provide return labels nor cover any cost incurred when shipping back your return.

For Canadian orders, we offer return labels and exchanges. However we charge a returns processing fee of $15 per return order and we do not refund any shipping fees. 

All Emma Pills items are final sale.

Items that are purchased on sale are final sale. They cannot be returned or exchanged, and no exceptions will be made for any fit or sizing issues.

If you are needing to begin your return, please follow the link here.

settings.title: Are there any steps to take before returning my order?
settings.answer: We recommend to always receive a receipt when dropping off your return. We do not recommend placing your return in a dropbox. If your return is lost and you have no proof of the return being sent out, we are unable to process your return.

settings.title: How do I return if I am an international customer?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you are needing to return! Please use this link to start your return.

settings.title: What is your returns processing fee?
settings.answer:
The returns processing fee helps to cover in part the cost of the shipping label that we provide to send your order back to our receiving team.

Orders returned for a refund will incur the returns processing fee -- exchanges & orders returned for store credit do not.

Start a return

settings.title: Can I use my own return label to process a return?
settings.answer:
The returns processing fee helps to cover in part the cost of the shipping label that we provide to send your order back to our receiving team.

If you would like to provide your own shipping label, please reach out to our customer service team to review the returns processing fee for you.

settings.title: How do I start my return request?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you are needing to return! Please click this link to start your return.

settings.title: What is your return policy for sale items and orders placed with a discount code?
settings.answer: Any item purchased on sale or at a marked down price is final sale and ineligible for any form of return or exchange. If a discount code was applied to a full retail priced item, the item is not final sale unless if the discount code is advertised as final sale. We do not offer any exceptions for this policy.

settings.title: If I return an order that had a discount code applied, will the discount code be available again for a new purchase?
settings.answer: Our discount codes are for one time use and are unable to be reloaded if you return your order.

settings.title: When will my exchange ship out?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you needed to return/exchange! When you submit an exchange it is not processed until the return has been sent back and the tracking label has updated to in transit with your returned products. Once your exchange has been processed, an order confirmation email will be sent over via email.

settings.title: When will my order be fulfilled?
settings.answer:
Our team asks for 1-7 business days to fulfill packages. Once your package has been fulfilled, an email will be sent confirming the tracking number.

Please note, we do not fulfill orders over the weekend and any expedited order placed after 12:30pm, will be fulfilled the following business day.

settings.title: If I am located in the US, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer:
Once your order has been shipped, we ask for 1-10 business days for delivery. Please note, packages are subject to carrier delays.

Please note: We do not ship and/or deliver on weekends & some orders will require a signature. Please allow up to 2 days for your order to be dispatched. All orders received after 1:00 PM on Friday will be shipped the following Monday.

* 2 Day Expedited/Overnight orders must be placed before 12:30pm PST to be sent out within the same business day. Expedited orders placed after 12:30pm PST will ship out on the following business day. Expedited orders are delivered Monday-Friday. There is no expedited option for weekend delivery.

settings.title: If I am located in the US, how much does shipping cost?
settings.answer:
We offer free standard shipping for US items over $200 pre-tax and pre-shipping. If your US order is under $200, our standard shipping can vary between $8-$10.

If you are needing to expedite your package, we offer overnight and 2-day delivery. This expedited shipping cost can vary between $18-$40.

Please note, we do not fulfill orders over the weekend and any expedited order placed after 12:30pm, will be fulfilled the following business day.

settings.title: My package says "delivered" but I haven't received it, can you assist?
settings.answer:
Oh no! Since the package was indicated that it was delivered, there are a few steps we suggest taking! Occasionally, packages are marked as delivered before they are physically at your address. Please allow 24 hours following a delivery confirmation before assuming that there is an issue with the delivery.

1. Contact your local post carrier and try to speak to your postal person directly, as sometimes they have a recollection of when and where they leave packages.
2. Make sure your mail area is secure, and leave a note to request that packages not be left unattended.
3. Is there a chance one of your neighbors mistakenly collected your package?

If you have completed all of the above, please visit UPS to file a claim and provide our team with this claim number.

We cannot be held responsible for orders that go missing after obtaining a “Delivered” status. Please ensure that you provide a shipping address that is attended during the day if your mail area is not secure. An official non-emergency police report must accompany all claims for packages not received after being marked "Delivered".

settings.title: How does your expedited shipping work?
settings.answer: All expedited orders need to be placed before 12:30pm PST to ship same day. If placed after 12:30pm PST, the order will ship out the following business day. We do not ship on weekends nor deliver on weekends. Orders placed on Friday after 12:30pm, will ship Monday. Orders placed with 2-day shipping on Thursday before 12:30pm PST, will arrive by end of day Monday and after 12:30pm PST would arrive Tuesday. Orders placed with overnight delivery after 12:30pm PST on Thursday, will arrive on Monday and before 12:30pm PST would arrive Friday. Orders placed with 2-day shipping on Friday before 12:30pm, will arrive Tuesday and after 12:30pm PST would arrive Wednesday. Orders placed with overnight delivery after 12:30pm PST on Friday, will arrive on Tuesday and before 12:30pm PST would arrive Monday.

settings.title: If I am located internationally, how much will shipping cost?
settings.answer: We ship all international packages via Passport Shipping that is then delivered to you through your local carrier. The shipping cost can vary depending on your location. Once you have entered in your location through our checkout page, the shipping fee will be displayed with any custom and duty tax prior to finalizing your order. Due to your location, shipping fees vary.

settings.title: If I am an Australian customer, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer:
We offer free express shipping for all AU orders over $250AUD/$180USD (prices on the US site are still displayed in USD in the checkout). 

Orders under $250AUD/$180USD have a $15USD express option. Shipping time is 7-30 business days.

All expedited and ground shipping can incur carrier delays that will extend this transit time.

settings.title: If I am an international customer, when will my order arrive?
settings.answer: Once your order has been shipped, we ask for 10-30 business days for delivery. Please note, packages are subject to carrier delays and all international packages will incur taxes by their local government.

settings.title: If I refused an international package, will I receive a refund?
settings.answer: We are sorry to hear you have refused your package! Once our team has received your returned package, we will process a refund for the items, minus the shipping fee. If your order was placed with our free international shipping, then we will deduct the cost incurred for returning your suit back to our warehouse.

settings.title: Do you ship orders to the UK & EU? If so, how will orders be shipped?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to the UK & EU. To get your order to you, we've partnered with Passport Shipping and they will be the Seller for all orders to the UK for orders under £135 and orders to the EU for orders €150 and Under.

settings.title: Will I have to pay taxes/duties in my home country?
settings.answer:
All international packages may be subject to taxes and duties. If you select the Passport Shipping option, this charge is calculated and shown in your total shipping price at checkout, and you will not have to pay anything on receipt of your parcel. If you select any shipping option other than Passport Shipping, your local customs office will assess the customs duties and fees and notify you of this additional charge by email, phone, or physical notice. The amount of the charge is completely at the discretion of one’s local government.

We are legally required to claim the full retail value price of products purchased and our shipping system automatically enters this information into the customs documents it creates.

Please note: If you used a discount on your order, your customs office assesses taxes based on the original retail price. 

Monday Swimwear is not held responsible nor can refund/reimburse for any taxes or duties charged by the customer’s local government. Any fees of this nature are the sole responsibility of the purchaser.

We are unable to offer a refund for taxes/duties.

settings.title: Can I calculate taxes/duties before delivery?
settings.answer:
If you select the Passport Shipping option, you will pay your duties and taxes upon checkout and your order is shipped DDP (Delivered Duty Paid), which means there is nothing for you to pay upon delivery.

If you do not use Passport Shipping option, we do not have the ability to estimate taxes prior to delivery.

Here are some helpful links:
- For information on Canadian Customs click HERE
- For information on UK Customs click HERE
- For information on Australia Customs click HERE

If you have any other questions about duties and taxes, please email us at customerservice@mondayswimwear.com

settings.title: Can my order be shipped DDU (Delivered Duty Unpaid)?
settings.answer: Some countries allow or require orders to be shipped DDU, these will be visible to your at time of checkout. Please note, we are unable to guarantee the cost of fees upon delivery. Duties and taxes are non-refundable.

settings.title: I purchased my items with a discount code, why was I charged duties on the full retail value?
settings.answer:
We are legally required to claim the full retail value of products purchased and our shipping system automatically enters this information into the customs documents it creates.

Some countries have an easy process for applying for a refund of overpaid duties when you show proof of any discount applied to your purchase.

Please check with your local customs agency for details of any duty refund program in your region.

Canadian customers can use the request form found here.

settings.title: What payment methods are accepted?
settings.answer:
We accept the following payment methods:
VISA
MasterCard
Discover
Amex
Apple Pay
PayPal

settings.title: Can I change/edit/cancel my order?
settings.answer: We process your order as soon as it's placed! Once an order has been placed we are unable to make ANY changes (This includes cancellations/shipping/billing addresses, shipping method, inserting promo code, removing/adding/altering an item in your order etc.)

settings.title: Need help with sizing?
settings.answer: We offer a detailed Fit Guide to help direct you to the right size in your Monday Swimwear. If you need any further assistance, please contact our customer service team through our contact page!

settings.title: How do I care for my suit?
settings.answer: We have chosen our Monday Swimwear fabric for it's perfect combination of softness and resiliency. To keep your Monday Swimwear suit in pristine condition, please follow our care instructions listed here.

settings.title: Is there anywhere I can try on Monday Swimwear?
settings.answer: Our online store is the only place in the world to buy original Monday Swimwear. We do occasionally host Pop-Up shops worldwide, in order to know when and where you can stay up to date through our email subscription and social media pages!

settings.title: Do you offer price adjustments?
settings.answer: We are unable to offer price adjustments and cannot apply discount codes to orders after they have been placed. Please note: Vouchers cannot be combined with other discount codes.

settings.title: When will I receive my gift card? Is an actual gift card sent out?
settings.answer: We ask for 1 business day to send out gift cards, please allow this time. We do not send out physical gift cards, we provide digital online gift certificates.

settings.title: Delay Shipping
settings.answer:
All the carriers are experiencing above normal volumes and are not keeping up with the higher than normal demand. UPS actually is doing better than most, FedEx next best, USPS is doing the worst. They are 14 days behind in some areas. It is common right now for USPS tracking to not be synchronized with actual deliveries. 
 
UPS has hired third parties, leased equipment, more staging space and temporary workers to get caught up. Unfortunately service sometimes is a bit compromised with all of this happening. But in the big scheme of things it’s usually a small percentage. UPS and FedEx have set up commercial access points for consumers to ship to with greater reliability in certain areas if desired by consumers. Another solution would be to use Route. They would work directly with the clients to process the delivery failures, do full refunds or reship items at no additional cost. From UPS we can expect approximately 95% reliability in delivery performance during this time.
 
At the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic, both FedEx and UPS suspended service guarantees, citing that business closures and above Peak Season volumes had impacted their ability to meet high standards of delivery service. However, both carriers have exception codes that invalidate money-back guarantees. 
 
FedEx service performance has been trending worse than UPS thus far during the pandemic. On-time percentage is in the low-90s for most weeks, which is a big lag behind their pre-Covid performance. FedEx maintains separate networks for Ground, SmartPost and Express, which makes them less flexible than UPS in this new environment.

In accordance with local governments, the Public Health Department and the Governor of California guidelines, our fulfillment center employees maintain at least six feet distance to ensure the safety of their health and to ensure orders are processed with minimal contact. For more information about social distancing practices, click here.

Should you have any questions about your order, please reach out to customerservice@mondayswimwear.com and we'd be happy to assist you!

settings.title: Will my return/refund be delayed?
settings.answer: Our team is currently processing returns/refunds as normal. Should there be any delays, we will update our FAQ.

settings.title: Give 15, Get 15
settings.text: Tell your friends about Monday Swimwear. They’ll get 15% off and you’ll get $15 for each friend who makes a purchase over $50. It’s a win-win.

settings.title: How do I join Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: It’s easy - simply sign up here. After that, every order you place will go towards your Reward status. Your tier will upgrade automatically once you reach those lifetime spends.

settings.title: What do I get for joining?
settings.answer: All members will receive an annual gift from us on their birthday. As you shop more, you’ll earn more rewards.

settings.title: What does “lifetime spend” mean?
settings.answer: Your lifetime spend is the total amount of money you’ve spent with Monday, excluding any discounts or refunds. After you unlock a new tier, all you have to do to maintain your status is to spend $50 in the following 12 months.

settings.title: What’s the birthday gift?
settings.answer: Like all the best gifts, this one is a surprise. But here’s a little hint: it could be a discount, a freebie, or something just for you.

settings.title: Can I use all my referral credits at once?
settings.answer: Yes! You can use your credits however you like. Spend them all at once or spread them out over a few purchases. You’ll have the option when checking out.

settings.title: How do I get my benefits?
settings.answer: All you have to do is shop! Any rewards or benefits will be automatically applied to your account.

settings.title: Will my past purchases count towards my Monday Rewards?
settings.answer: The last 12 months of spend from 4/21/2019 will count towards your tier status.

settings.title: Ready to Join
settings.text: Want discounts, gifts, and exclusive early access? All you have to do is shop.

We use our own and third-party cookies to improve your experience and our services, and to analyze the use of our website. If you continue browsing, we take that to mean that you accept their use. See info.

settings.title: How To Care For Your Monday Styles
settings.text: Thoughtfully designed to be worn season after season, we have chosen our Monday Swimwear fabric for it's perfect combination of softness and resiliency. To keep your Monday Swimwear pieces in pristine condition, please follow our care instructions listed below.

settings.title: Wash your suit in fresh cold water with a gentle cleanser as soon as possible after wearing. Ideally, soak your suit in a bowl or the sink for at least for 20 minutes before adding a small cap full of a gentle hand soap that contains no moisturizers, or a gentle detergent specifically formulated for fabrics with a high spandex content. Gently work the soapy water through the entire suit and make sure to rinse thoroughly in cold water until all soap is gone.
Lay your suit flat to dry in the shade on a towel and use caution to never ring out the fabric or hang it, which could cause stretching and wear to the delicate fabric.

Never, ever wash your suit in the washing machine, even on the delicate/hand-wash cycle. Water temperatures in washing machines are incredibly hard to regulate and the detergents made for machines are far too strong for swimwear fabric.

Sun cream, tanning cream, chlorine, and hot tubs, can cause extreme damage and discolor suits, so we recommend to be cautious of wearing your suit or getting your suit in contact with these substances. In addition, any rough surface can cause pulling and snagging of the delicate fabric.
Caring for your suit in the appropriate manner is the best way possible to ensure that it will not deteriorate in an untimely manner.

To properly hand-wash beachwear, place it in a clean sink with cool water and mild detergent. Gently soak the garment, then remove from the soapy water. Drain the soapy water, rinse the sink and refill with cool water. Rinse the garments and repeat until the water is soap-free.
After washing, the best way to dry it is by laying the garment flat in an airy space. It's best to avoid the dryer since heat can damage the shape and quality.

settings.text: Our Monday Beachwear is designed from a variety of eco-friendly, lightweight and sustainably made fabrics. Some of our Linen styles are made from flax, which is a natural fiber that is recyclable and bio-degradable. It is considered one of the most eco-friendly fabrics because it grows naturally with little energy, and requires only rainwater to grow. When harvested, the entirety of the flax plant can be used for various products so no part goes to waste. Please follow our care instructions listed below for our beachwear.

settings.title: Is the pop-up appointment only?
settings.answer: No, but due to the high volume of traffic we expect to receive, we strongly suggest making an appointment/reservation through our link here. Please note, each appointment/reservation is for 1 person only. If you are bringing a friend, please have them make an appointment too. We look forward to helping you find your perfect fit!

settings.title: Where is the pop-up located?
settings.answer: The Pop Up at the Park will be located by the Nordstrom courtyard entrance. If lost, please visit the concierge at the parking structure by the restrooms.

settings.title: Can I return an online order at the pop-up?
settings.answer: We're so sorry your online order wasn't the perfect fit. Unfortunately due to the limited space, we are not accepting online order returns or exchanges at our pop-up location. Should you need further assistance, please email us at customerservice@mondayswimwear.com or you can process a return by using this link.
